import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import checkCodService from'../services/checkCodService';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{useCod}from'../context/CodContext';// Importa el contexto de código
import Header from'./Header';import'./RedimirCodigos.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RedimirCodigos=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const{setCod}=useCod();// Usar setCod del contexto de código
const[cod,setCodInput]=useState('');const[isAvailable,setIsAvailable]=useState(false);const[msgResponse,setMsgResponse]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCodChange=event=>{setCodInput(event.target.value);};const handleCheckCod=async()=>{try{const response=await checkCodService(cod,token);setIsAvailable(response.is_available);setMsgResponse(response.msg_response);setError('');if(response.is_available==="true"){setCod(cod);// Guarda el código en el contexto de código
navigate('/eventos');}}catch(error){setIsAvailable(false);setMsgResponse('El código no existe.');setError(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"redimir-codigos-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Redimir C\xF3digos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:cod,onChange:handleCodChange,placeholder:"Ingrese el c\xF3digo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCheckCod,children:"Verificar C\xF3digo"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),msgResponse&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isAvailable==="true"?"success-message":"error-message",children:msgResponse})]});};export default RedimirCodigos;
